thread.title: Three pistols seized, two arrested in Motijheel drive
thread.title_full: Three pistols seized, two arrested in Motijheel drive

title: Three pistols seized, two arrested in Motijheel drive
text:
Three pistols seized, two arrested in Motijheel drive Senior Correspondent, bdnews24.com Published: 2017-02-21 20:12:25.0 BdST Updated: 2017-02-21 20:12:25.0 BdST Police have seized three pistols and arrested two in a drive in the capital's Motijheel. 
Motijheel Police Station OC Omar Faruq told bdnews24.com that the duo, identified as 'Nahid' and 'Noman', were arrested at Jasimuddin Road on Tuesday afternoon on a tip-off. 
One fully loaded pistol was found on them and later two more pistols and several rounds of bullets were found in a raid on Noman's house in the same area, Faruq said. Nahid lives in Wari. 
"We are conducting a drive to be sure whether they have any accomplices or more arms are stashed in the area," the OC said. 
In response to a query, he told bdnews24.com that police were not sure if they belong to any political party.
